document_title: Preop History and Physical ESRD due to hypertensive nephrosclerosis
Transplant Surgery Operative Note deceased donor kidney right iliac fossa
ICU Progress Note POD 1 reperfusion stable hemodynamics adequate
Immunosuppression Initiation Plan tacrolimus MMF prednisone with taper
Pharmacy Medication Reconciliation and Education adherence counseling and pillbox setup
Discharge Summary post kidney transplant hospital course and followup
Nursing Discharge Teaching drain care wound care warning signs reviewed
Transplant Nephrology Clinic Note week 1 followup labs reviewed
Laboratory Results tacrolimus trough CMP CBC urinalysis
Transplant Clinic Note week 2 blood pressure management and home readings
DSA Screen Report HLA antibody single antigen beads class I and II
Transplant Clinic Note week 4 DSA negative plan continue prophylaxis
Viral Monitoring Panel CMV EBV BK quantitative PCR
Transplant Clinic Note week 6 BK negative tacrolimus dose adjustment
Nutrition Followup low sodium diet and fluid goals
Transplant Clinic Acute Visit mild creatinine rise tacrolimus supratherapeutic
Ultrasound Renal Allograft with Doppler patent vessels no hydronephrosis
Transplant Clinic Note week 10 stable graft function adherence reinforced
Pharmacy MTM followup pillbox check refill synchronization
Protocol Biopsy Procedure Note three month ultrasound guided
Pathology Report allograft biopsy Banff scores and interpretation
Telemedicine Followup labs reviewed DSA negative stable plan
Transplant Clinic Note week 16 vaccines updated CMV PCR negative
Social Work Note return to work planning support and transportation
